Title: Ruling Days
Writer: Martin Zimmerman, Bill Dubuque (created by), Mark Williams (created by), Martin Zimmerman (story editor), Paul Kolsby (staff writer)
Actors: Jason Bateman, Laura Linney, Sofia Hublitz, Skylar Gaertner
Plot: Marty decides to invest in the religious sector, unaware he will disrupt a discreet business operation. A surprise visitor shows up at the Byrde home.
